Text:
Classification: Game Show
Genre: Celebrities | Lifestyle
Status: Returning Series
Network: ITV2 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Thursdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 45 Minutes
Premiere: September 24, 2008
Episode Order: 14

Celebrity Juice is a topical panel game hosted by Keith Lemon (played by comedian Leigh Francis) . Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton are the team captains. The teams are asked different questions on the current celebrities making the news. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/Celebrity_Juice)
